title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
context: Showcase development skills and projects to potential employers and clients.
actions: Integrated contact form with email service
results: Increased online visibility and received positive feedback from recruiters.

title: Task Manager App
description: A full-stack task management application for teams.
context: Built to streamline team collaboration and task tracking.
actions: Developed REST API with Node.js and Express
results: Improved team productivity and reduced missed deadlines.

title: E-commerce Store
description: A scalable e-commerce platform with payment integration.
context: Created for a local business to expand online sales.
actions: Set up product catalog and shopping cart
results: Boosted sales by 40% in the first quarter after launch.
